CN.content:

Paragraph: 5a Besides , the deep blue color of PCDSeBT solution is observed unlike the red color of PCDTBT in solution ( see the digital photograph in Figure 1a ).

| Material Name |
| --- |

| PCDTBT |

In this paragraph, the two "Material Name" entities are "PCDSeBT" and "PCDTBT". These are the names of two different chemical solutions mentioned in the paragraph.
